testcase.name: Add Products in Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to "autoexUrl" autoexercise..................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click Products button...................................................passed And Hover over first product and click Add to cart..........................passed And Click Continue Shopping button..........................................passed And Hover over second product and click Add to cart.........................passed And Click View Cart button..................................................passed Then Verify both products are added to Cart.................................passed Then Verify their prices, quantity and total price..........................passed
